item.description:
Synth rockers and excellent live band Bear in Heaven are hitting Brighton Music Hall this spring to play material from their new album. Their album is currently streaming on their site, though they're playing it once over the span of 4 months, so it's playing very, very slowly. There's a nice note playing right now. Anyways, real-time tracks I recommend to check out are Lovesick Teenagers, You Do You, and Fake Out, as well as a new one, The Reflection of You.

Let's meet at 7:30 at Tavern on the Square on Brighton Ave (it's right across the street from the venue). We'll head over to the Brighton Music Hall after 8:30.

The opening acts are Blouse and Doldrums. Doors at 8 PM; Show at 9 PM; 18+ Show Advance Box Office Price $12
item.name: Bear in Heaven
